sentences.sContent: economic policies that threaten to undermine the health care system
sentences.sCn: 可能会损害医疗保健制度的经济政策

sentences.sContent: ...can undermine the political will of participating countries to act...
...has presented a wide range of examples that undermine the notion that there are any truly fundamental laws of capitalism...
...If it is true that sports undermine the academic mission of American schools...
...James Coleman suggests in his earlier writings that school athletics would undermine a school's image...

synos.tran: 破坏，渐渐破坏；挖掘地基

remMethod.val: under(下面) ＋ mine(挖) → 在下面挖 → 暗中破坏

trans.tranOther: to gradually make someone or something less strong or effective
